title: OpenSystems Log Ingestion for Azure Sentinel
summary: This solution deploys a Logstash instance to collect various OpenSystems logs (Proxy, Auth, Firewall, ZTNA, Mail, Zeek) from an Event Hub and ingests them into Azure Sentinel, enabling security monitoring and threat detection.
description: The OpenSystems Log Ingestion solution provides a streamlined way to integrate your OpenSystems security logs with Azure Sentinel. It leverages a Logstash container deployed in your Azure tenant to pull logs from a configured Event Hub, parse them, and send them to your Sentinel workspace. The solution includes a data connector and is designed to work with ASIM parsers for normalized data.
prerequisites: An Azure Event Hubs Namespace with Event Hubs for each log type you want to ingest.
An Azure AD App Registration (Service Principal) with necessary permissions (Log Analytics Contributor on the workspace, Monitoring Metrics Publisher on Data Collection Rules).
Connection string for the Event Hub Namespace.
Client ID and Client Secret for the Service Principal.
